name: Create Ecomail.cz subscribers from new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new subscriber is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically add a new subscriber to a selected Ecomail.cz list. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1G81b-q-iHP-xXUF9qZz8a8_QpnX2RzHOhmO1PISqo9Q/edit?usp=sharing).
